get_height_more_than_avg.main: SELECT player_name, height, team_id FROM player AS a WHERE height > (@get_avg_height())
get_height_more_than_avg.get_avg_height: SELECT avg(height) FROM player AS b WHERE a.team_id = b.team_id

main.sql: UPDATE users SET address = '${address.province}省${address.city}市' WHERE id = ${id}
UPDATE users SET address = '${address[0]}省${address[1]}市' WHERE id = ${id}

array_object_param.main: INSERT INTO users (name, address) VALUES (@user_value(user = users[0])), (@user_value(user = users[1]))

main.sql: INSERT INTO users (name, address) VALUES (@user_value(user = users[id[0]])), (@user_value(user = users[id[1]]))
